alert.note: Alert for Hendricks; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:39AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hendricks and northern Putnam Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 638 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Greencastle, or 19 miles south of Crawfordsville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Hendricks and northern Putnam Counties, including the following locations... Stilesville, Amo, Bainbridge, Carpentersville, Coatesville, Fillmore, and Groveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
